AttributeMetaData.name: ADT TOTAL
AttributeMetaData.command: SELECT concat(BRKEY, Bridge_ID) AS UniqueIdentifier, CAST(INSPDATE AS DATETIME) AS DateTime, CAST(REPLACE(ADTTOTAL, ',', '') AS float) AS Value FROM dbo.PennDot_Report_A WHERE (ISNUMERIC(ADTTOTAL) = 1)

AttributeMetaData.name: MATERIAL TYPE
AttributeMetaData.command: SELECT concat(BRKEY, Bridge_ID) AS UniqueIdentifier, CAST(INSPDATE AS DATETIME) AS DateTime, Material_Type AS Value FROM dbo.PennDot_Report_A

AttributeMetaData.name: COUNTY
AttributeMetaData.command: SELECT concat(BRKEY, Bridge_ID) AS UniqueIdentifier, CAST(INSPDATE AS DATETIME) AS DateTime, CAST(COUNTY AS varchar(50)) AS Value FROM dbo.PennDot_Report_A
